title: Scallops with bacon, black pudding and colcannon
description: Scallops with black pudding have become a Great British restaurant classic. Here’s how to cook the taste sensation in your own kitchen.
ingredients: 16 medium-sized scallops, shelled, coral removed and cleaned
200g/7oz black pudding, cut into 12 thick slices
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper
750g/1lb 11oz potatoes, preferably Maris Piper or King Edward, peeled, chopped
